name: @waelio/messaging
author: Waelio
description: A real-time messaging application with direct & broadcast messages, user lists, and optional MongoDB persistence.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.client.json && npm run generate:icons && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p public && cp src/client/index.html public/index.html && for f in favicon.ico favicon.png favicon.svg apple-touch-icon.png site.webmanifest favicon-16x16.png favicon-32x32.png; do [ -f src/client/$f ] && cp src/client/$f public/$f || true; [ -f $f ] && cp $f public/$f || true; done; [ -d src/client/static ] && cp -R src/client/static/* public/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:verify && npm version patch -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:verify && npm version minor -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run release:verify && npm version major -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push --follow-tags
